testcase.name: test_0001_Debug can be turned on for external links and loading external link is blocked

error.type: test_0001_Debug can be turned on for external links and loading external link is blocked
error.message: Timed out waiting for response to {"name":"visit","args":["http://127.0.0.1:60928/"]}. It's possible that this happened because something took a very long time (for example a page load was slow). If so, setting the Poltergeist :timeout option to a higher value will help (see the docs for details). If increasing the timeout does not help, this is probably a bug in Poltergeist - please report it to the issue tracker.

test_0003_Debug can be turned on on page load which displays analytics info within the page
test_0004_Debug can be turned off which will not display analytics info within the page
